name: White Nights In Pyongyang
description:
You are very hungry in a cold and dark city. Luckily there is a sausage stand that is not closed yet! But hurry up, you have only 70 seconds to get there!

The path is full of junk and the flamingos and drones will steal your last nerve.

We believe in you! You can do it!

By the way: the platforms are only REAL when they are illuminated!

This is our entry for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1 with the theme "It is NOT real": https://itch.io/jam/brackeys-7

  • Concept: Bischoff & Kessler
  • Graphics: Kessler
  • Programming: Bischoff
  • Sound: Bischoff & Kessler
  • Music: Bischoff
